skills.name: Blast Shield
skills.static: {{pp|16 to 12 for 9|formula=16.5-0.5 per level up to 9, where it caps}}
skills.blurb: Vi charges a shield over time. The shield can be activated by hitting an enemy with an ability.
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Vi''' gains a {{tip|shield}} equal to {{sti|{{as|15% of her '''maximum''' health}}}} for 3 seconds whenever she hits an enemy with an [[champion ability|ability]].
''Blast Shield's'' {{sti|cooldown}} is reduced by 3 seconds for every trigger of {{ai|Denting Blows|Vi}}.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Vi gains a shield equal to 15% of her maximum health for 3 seconds whenever she hits an enemy with an champion ability.
Blast Shield's cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds for every trigger of Vi's Denting Blows.
skills.notes: * Triggering {{ai|Denting Blows|Vi}} will not activate ''Blast Shield''.

skills.name: Vault Breaker
skills.target_range: {{pp|type=channel time|250 to 715 for 11|round1=3|0 to 1.25|formula=250+(46.5 per 0.125 seconds). ''This is capped at 1.25 seconds.''}}
skills.speed: {{pp|type=channel time|1250 to 1400 for 11|round1=3|0 to 1.25|formula=1250+(15 per 0.125 seconds). ''This is capped at 1.25 seconds.''}}
skills.blurb: Vi charges her gauntlets and unleashes a vault shattering punch, carrying her forward. Enemies she hits are knocked back and receive a stack of Denting Blows.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Vi''' {{tip|channel|charges}} while being {{tip|slow|slowed}} by 15% for up to 4 seconds to increase ''Vault Breaker's'' {{sti|range}}, speed, and damage over the first {{fd|1.25}} seconds of the channel. ''Vault Breaker'' can be recast at any time within its duration.
If the charge completes without reactivation, ''Vault Breaker'' is canceled and goes on full cooldown.

{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Vi''' {{tip|dashes}} in the target direction, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies within her path, increased by {{pp|type=channel time|key=%|0 to 100 for 11|0 to 1.25|round1=3|formula=10% per 0.125 seconds. ''This is capped at 1.25 seconds.''}}.

'''Vi''' stops upon colliding with an enemy champion, {{tip|airborne|knocking them back}} in the direction she is facing, while non-champion enemies hit along her path are instead {{tip|airborne|pulled}} towards her.
''Vault Breaker'' will go on a 3-second {{sti|cooldown}} if the charged channel is canceled.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Vi charges while being slowed by 15% for up to 4 seconds to increase Vault Breaker's range, speed, and damage over the first 1.25 seconds of the channel. Vault Breaker can be recast at any time within its duration.
If the charge completes without reactivation, Vault Breaker is canceled and goes on full cooldown.
Recast: Vi dashes in the target direction, dealing physical damage to all enemies within her path, increased by 0 to 1.25 ‒ undefined.
Vi stops upon colliding with an enemy champion, knocking them back in the direction she is facing, while non-champion enemies hit along her path are instead pulled towards her.
Vault Breaker will go on a 3-second cooldown if the charged channel is canceled.
leveling: {{st|Minimum Physical Damage|{{ap|55 to 155}} {{as|(+ 70% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Maximum Damage|{{ap|55*2 to 155*2}} {{as|(+ 140% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}

effects.str:
• Minimum Physical Damage: (+ 70% bonus AD)
  • Maximum Damage: (+ 140% bonus AD)

skills.name: Denting Blows
skills.blurb: Vi's punches break her opponent's Armor, dealing bonus damage and granting her Attack Speed.
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Vi's''' [[basic attack]]s {{tip|on-hit}} and {{ai|Vault Breaker|Vi}} apply a [[stack]] of ''Denting Blows'' to affected enemies for 4 seconds, [[stack]]ing up to 3 times, with the duration refreshing on subsequent applications. The third stack consumes them all to deal {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} and {{sti|armor penetration|{{as|reduce the target's armor by 20%}}}}, with the '''bonus''' damage capped at 300 against non-champions.
After triggering ''Denting Blows'', '''Vi''' gains {{sti|as|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} for 4 seconds, refreshing on subsequent triggers.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Vi's basic attacks on-hit and Vi's Vault Breaker apply a stack of Denting Blows to affected enemies for 4 seconds, stacking up to 3 times, with the duration refreshing on subsequent applications. The third stack consumes them all to deal bonus physical damage and reduce the target's armor by 20%, with the bonus damage capped at 300 against non-champions.
After triggering Denting Blows, Vi gains bonus attack speed for 4 seconds, refreshing on subsequent triggers.
leveling: {{st|Bonus Physical Damage|{{as|{{ap|4 to 10}}% {{as|(+{{ft|1% per 35|{{fd|2.86}}% per 100}}'''bonus''' AD)}} of target's '''maximum''' health}}}}
skills.notes:
* The armor penetration will apply after the triggering damage.
* The enhanced attack applies other {{tip|on-hit}} effects and can both {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal as well as apply {{sti|life steal|link=true}} (the bonus damage cannot do either) but does not affect structures.
* ''Denting Blows'' can be {{tip|blocked}} but cannot be {{tip|dodged}} nor missed while '''Vi''' is {{tip|blind|blinded}}.

effects.str: • Bonus Physical Damage: % (+bonus AD) of target's maximum health

st_slices: % (+bonus AD) of target's maximum health

skills.name: Excessive Force
skills.static: {{tt|1|Starts when the attack has been dealt}}
skills.blurb: Vi's next attack blasts through her target, dealing damage to enemies behind it.
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Vi''' periodically stores up to 2 ''Excessive Force'' charges.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Vi's''' next [[basic attack]] within 6 seconds has an {{tip|uncancelable windup}}, gains {{sti|range|50 '''bonus''' range}} and deals modified {{as|physical damage}}, as well as deals the same damage to all enemies in a cone in the direction of the target. ''Excessive Force'' can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} for {{as|{{critical damage|75|100}} AD}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}.
''Excessive Force'' {{tip|basic attack reset|resets}} '''Vi's''' basic attack timer.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Vi periodically stores up to 2 Excessive Force charges.
Active: Vi's next basic attack within 6 seconds has an uncancelable windup, gains 50 bonus range and deals modified physical damage, as well as deals the same damage to all enemies in a cone in the direction of the target. Excessive Force can critically strike for (+ IE 25%) AD bonus physical damage.
Excessive Force resets Vi's basic attack timer.
skills.notes:
* The empowered attack has the same windup time as '''Vi's''' basic attacks.
* ''Excessive Force'' deals {{tip|basic damage}} to the primary target and {{tip|area damage}} to secondary targets hit by the are of effect.
* {{ai|Denting Blows|Vi}} will only apply a stack on ''Excessive Force's'' primary target (does not interact with the cone's damage).
* If the ''Excessive Force'' buff is about to run out as '''Vi''' starts the attack windup, the duration will be updated and extended to allow '''Vi''' to still sucessfully attack.

effects.str: • Physical Damage: (+ 110% AD) (+ 90% AP)

skills.name: Assault and Battery
skills.speed: {{tt|800|Initial speed, ramps up over the duration}}
skills.blurb: Vi runs down an enemy, knocking aside anyone in the way. When she reaches her target she knocks it into the air, jumps after it, and slams it back into the ground.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Vi''' {{tip|true sight|reveals}} the target enemy {{tip|champion}} and {{tip|dash|dashes}} with {{tip|displacement immunity}} towards them, dealing them {{as|physical damage}} and {{tip|airborne|knocking them up}} for {{fd|1.25}} seconds upon arrival.
Enemies within her path are dealt the same damage, {{tip|airborne|knocked aside}} by 350 units over {{fd|0.25}} seconds, and simultaneously {{tip|stun|stunned}} for {{fd|0.75}} seconds.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Vi reveals the target enemy champion and dashes with displacement immunity towards them, dealing them physical damage and knocking them up for 1.25 seconds upon arrival.
Enemies within her path are dealt the same damage, knocked aside by 350 units over 0.25 seconds, and simultaneously stunned for 0.75 seconds.
skills.notes:
* '''Vi''' will track the target if they change locations.
** She will stop dashing if the target is too far away.
*** If this occurs, she will maintain her {{tip|displacement immunity}} for 7 seconds.{{bug}}
** There is no maximum tracking range.
* The {{tip|airborne|knock up}} cannot be overridden by other {{tip|airborne}} effects nor can it be ended early by {{tip|knockdown}} effects.
* '''Vi''' can cast {{si|Flash}} to reposition herself during the {{tip|dash}} without ending the dash prematurely.
* Targets that were {{tip|airborne|knocked aside}} are immune to being affected by this again for about 4 seconds.
* '''Vi''' is {{tip|displacement immune}} while {{tip|airborne|knocking up}} her primary target but loses it afterwards.
** She cannot cast {{si|Flash}} during this part of the ability.
* While charging, '''Vi's''' {{tip|dash}} speed ramps up overtime to ensure the target cannot escape.
* If the target becomes {{tip|untargetable}}, is too far away, or {{tip|death|dies}} during ''Assault and Battery's'' cast time, the ability will cancel. ''Assault and Battery'' does not go on {{sti|cooldown}} nor consume {{sti|{{as|mana}}}} in any of these cases.
** However, if '''Vi''' is {{tip|dash|dashing}} and the target becomes ''untargetable'', she loses her {{tip|unstoppable|unstoppability}}, stops dashing, and instead walks towards the target {{tt|forcefully|movement commands are ignored}}. If she comes into contact with the target, she will apply the {{tip|airborne}} effect but no damage is dealt.
* If '''Vi''' goes into {{tip|resurrection}} during ''Assault and Battery's'' cast time she will still initiate the {{tip|dash}} and apply the {{tip|airborne|knock up}} to her target but no damage is dealt.
** If '''Vi''' however enters  ''resurrection'' during the dash, she will stop, but will keep the ''unstoppability'' for another 3 seconds after ''reviving''.
* ''Assault and Battery'' will cancel and go on full cooldown if '''Vi''' is affected by {{ai|Fear Beyond Death 2|Urgot|Fear Beyond Death's}} recast during the cast time.
* '''Vi''' will apply the ''knock up'' and damage even if she {{tip|death|dies}} while being in range of her target.
* {{tip|Displacement immunity}} will not resist the application of the {{tip|stun}}.
* The following table refers for interactions while '''Vi''' is {{tip|dash|dashing}}:
{{ct|attack=false|move=false|cast={{ai|Excessive Force|Vi}} is usable. {{ai|Vault Breaker|Vi}} is disabled.|items=false|consume=false|spells=true,true,false,false,true|interrupts=death}}
